mapper.select: select b.LineName,b.Region,convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'OutDate',a.AdultPrice,a.OldPrice,a.BabyPrice,a.ChildPrice,b.MaxNumber, (select sum(AllNumber) from Apply where OutDate = a.OutDate group by ApplyNo) as 'DoAllNumber' from Price a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id join Apply c on c.LineId = b.Id

select b.LineName,b.Region,convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'OutDate',a.AdultPrice,a.OldPrice,a.BabyPrice,a.ChildPrice,b.MaxNumber, (select sum(AllNumber) from Apply where OutDate = a.OutDate group by ApplyNo) as 'DoAllNumber' from Price a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id join Apply c on c.LineId = b.Id where b.LineName like #{line_region_name} or b.Region like #{line_region_name}

select b.LineName,b.Region,convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'OutDate',a.AdultPrice,a.OldPrice,a.BabyPrice,a.ChildPrice,b.MaxNumber, (select sum(AllNumber) from Apply where OutDate = #{OutDate} group by ApplyNo) as 'DoAllNumber' from Price a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id join Apply c on c.LineId = b.Id where b.LineName like #{line_region_name} or b.Region like #{line_region_name} and a.OutDate = #{OutDate}

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AdultNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.OldNumber,a.ChildNumber, a.statu,a.CompanyName,a.CompanyUser,a.IsPayment,a.IsCancel from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AdultNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.OldNumber,a.ChildNumber, a.statu,a.CompanyName,a.CompanyUser,a.IsPayment,a.IsCancel from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.ApplyNo like #{applyNo_name} and b.LineName like #{lineName_name}
